languages.text: {n}Старая техника, долго пролежавшая под открытым небом, буквально рассыпается у вас в руках. Но, по крайней мере, теперь ясно, что скелеты тут десятки или сотни лет.{/n}

{n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старая техника, долго пролежавшая под открытым небом, буквально рассыпается у вас в руках. Но, по крайней мере, теперь ясно, что скелеты тут десятки или сотни лет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

{n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

{n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

{n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

{n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台老旧的沉思者已经饱经风霜，在你手里几乎分崩离析。不过，至少你现在弄清楚了——这两具白骨已经在这里呆了几十年，甚至几百年了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台老旧的思考器已经饱经风霜，在你手里几乎分崩离析。不过，至少你现在弄清楚了——这两具白骨已经在这里呆了几十年，甚至几百年了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esta tecnología vieja lleva mucho tiempo expuesta a los elementos y casi se deshace en tus manos. Lo único que sacas en claro es que los esqueletos llevan aquí décadas, posiblemente siglos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esta tecnología vieja lleva mucho tiempo expuesta a los elementos y casi se deshace en tus manos. Lo único que sacas en claro es que los esqueletos llevan aquí décadas, posiblemente siglos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}長期間風雨にさらされたこの古い装備は、手の中で粉々に砕けるものの、少なくともこれで、骸骨が何十年、あるいは何世紀にもわたってここに存在していることがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}長期間風雨にさらされたこの古い装備は、手の中で粉々に砕けるものの、少なくともこれで、骸骨が何十年、あるいは何世紀にもわたってここに存在していることがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die alte Tech war lange den Elementen ausgeliefert und zerfällt in deinen Händen praktisch zu Staub. Aber wenigstens weißt du jetzt, dass die Skelette schon Jahrzehnte oder sogar Jahrhunderte hier sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Tech war lange den Elementen ausgeliefert und zerfällt in deinen Händen praktisch zu Staub. Aber wenigstens weißt du jetzt, dass die Skelette schon Jahrzehnte oder sogar Jahrhunderte hier sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieil équipement a été exposé aux éléments pendant si longtemps qu'il tombe pratiquement en poussière entre vos doigts. Mais vous avez néanmoins la certitude désormais que ces squelettes se trouvent ici depuis des décennies, voire des siècles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil équipement a été exposé aux éléments pendant si longtemps qu'il tombe pratiquement en poussière entre vos doigts. Mais vous avez néanmoins la certitude désormais que ces squelettes se trouvent ici depuis des décennies, voire des siècles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu eski cihaz, uzun bir zamandır kötü hava şartlarına maruz kalmış. Dokundukça elinde parçalara ayrılıyor. En azından artık bu iskeletlerin onlarca, hatta yüzlerce yıldır burada olduğunu biliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old tech has been exposed to the elements for a long time and is practically crumbling to dust in your hands. But at least now you know that the skeletons have been here for decades or centuries.{/n}
